StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SelectAddress]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonId uniqueiden..er, @Type .nyint ) AS
SELECT [AddressId], [CountryCode], [CountryName], [StateCode], [StateName], [CountyCode], [CountyName], [CityCode], [CityName], [Street1], [Street2], [ZipCode], [FromDate], [ToDate], [Type] FROM [ACP].[vwAddress] WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonId AND Type = @Type
